articles.title: NASA Astronomy Picture of the Day 15 June 2023: M15 Globular Star Cluster snapped by Hubble - HT Tech
articles.description: Today’s NASA Astronomy Picture of the Day is a breathtaking snapshot of M15, a globular star cluster that is located about 33600 light-years away towards the constellation of Pegasus.
articles.content: Over the past few months, we've seen several amazing images of celestial objects as part of NASA Astronomy Picture of the Day, which is published on a daily basis featuring astrophotographers from ar… [+2243 chars]

articles.title: Instagram Notes gets BIG feature update; Lets users add songs they’ve been listening to - HT Tech
articles.description: Instagram Notes, also known as Instagram status updates, has received a new feature that allows users to add songs they are jamming with. Check details.
